p: Volatile components were divided into monoterpenes (hydrocarbons and oxygenated), sesquiterpenes (hydrocarbons and oxygenated), diterpenes (hydrocarbons and oxygenated), and non-terpenes, on the basis of their functional groups ( Table 2). Out of the total components, approximately 73.03% and 83.24% monoterpenes were identified in the essential oil of EC-G and EC-I capsules, respectively.
